title: Supplemental Instruction Design Based on Individualized Learning Materials to Improve Educational Outcomes in Low-Income Areas

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Educational Program Design and Project-Based Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing practical program design and evaluation capabilities for current practitioners to improve educational environments in low-income areas

learning_goals: Learners can develop supplementary education programs that address educational disparities by applying individualized learning material design principles.
Learners can enhance their ability to analyze the effectiveness of educational programs through project-based assessment.
Learners can propose sustainable educational support systems utilizing community resources.

resources: Mathematics and Science Foundational Concept Worksheet Templates

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
